== Version 1.0 ==
New features for DbDoc and DbDocCmd:
 * Get documentation for several owners for one database user. You can set up comma separated list of owners in properties file.
 * OutputDirectory in properties file now is a root documentation directory. Directory structure will be created automatically as follows OutputDirectory/User/Owner 
New features for DbDoc:
 * Local documentation cache
 * Processing indicator

== Version 0.2 ==
